item.title: Small Favors
item.description: Haaaaa, this was so FUN. And hot. And silly. I loved the manifesto introduction by Kelly Sue Deconnick about the power of play and the radical defiance of silliness, how itâ€™s like lowering a rope in a dark well that saves the people at both ends.
